text: ksʹatriy tras wa reuxngraw khxng phwk thex pen chen ri meux phwk thex yaw ywn yu suf phwk nang klaw wa khx xallxh thrng khumkhrxng rea miru ma kxn ley wa khea tha chaw phriya khxng phu wa‡ klaw wa badni khwam cring di prakt khun læw chan di yawywn khea læa thæcring khea khux phu hnung nı hmu phu saty cring xyang nænxn
